sentences.english: Whisky is a general term describing many spirits.
sentences.chinese: 威士忌總括起來是描述一些烈酒。

sentences.english: Christ's remarkable words concerning Himself were a summary of all He had been saying for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 基督把他一直以來預言自己的話總括起來。

sentences.english: In conclusion, are you satisfied with the use of land for development of WKCD?
sentences.chinese: 總括而言，您滿意西九龍文化區發展土地規劃用途嗎？

sentences.english: When the insurance policy matures, the insured person will receive the capital sum agreed.
sentences.chinese: 保險單到期時，投保人會得到一筆總括性付款。

sentences.english: Finally sum up contemporary staff education and training characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 最後總括當代員工教育和培訓的特點。

sentences.english: Generally to say, is enthusiastic pursuit of the world in general.
sentences.chinese: 總括地說，世人一般所熱心的是沽名釣譽。

definition: proletariat/abbr. for 普羅列塔利亞|普罗列塔利亚[pu3 luo2 lie4 ta3 li4 ya4] plus masses/also written 無產階級|无产阶级[wu2 chan3 jie1 ji2] in PRC Marxist theory
(Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
social movement/abbr. for 社會運動|社会运动
student of a senior high school
to break up into components/to disintegrate/to collapse/to crumble
lit. only one branch of the tree is thriving (idiom)/fig. to be in a league of one's own/outstanding
bizarre/paradoxical/a paradox (from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子)
